title: treesitter.r: 'R' Grammar for 'Tree-Sitter' — treesitter.r-package
text: Provides bindings 'R' grammar 'Tree-sitter', used alongside 'treesitter' package. 'Tree-sitter' builds concrete syntax trees source files language, can efficiently update syntax trees source file edited.
